Description_lang: An improved Bear Form that grants the benefits of Berserk, causes Mangle to hit up to $s12 targets, $?a429536[increases Arcane damage by $s14%, ][]and increases maximum health by $s13%.$?a339062[Grants immunity to effects that cause loss of control of your character.][]Lasts $d. You may freely shapeshift in and out of this improved Bear Form for its duration.
AuraDescription_lang: Cooldowns of Mangle, Thrash, Growl, and Frenzied Regeneration are reduced by $w1%.Ironfur cost reduced by $w3%.Mangle hits up to $w12 targets.Health increased by $w13%.$?a429536[Arcane damage increased by $w14%.][]$?$w7>0[Immune to effects that cause loss of control of your character.][]

description_blz.en_US:
An improved Bear Form that grants the benefits of Berserk, causes Mangle to hit up to 3 targets, and increases maximum health by 30%.

Lasts 30 sec. You may freely shapeshift in and out of this improved Bear Form for its duration.
description_blz.es_MX:
Una Forma de oso mejorada que otorga los beneficios de Rabia, hace que Destrozar golpee hasta 3 objetivos y aumenta un 30% la salud máxima.

Dura 30 s. Puedes adoptar la Forma de oso mejorada y salir de ella las veces que quieras mientras dure.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Forma de Urso aprimorada que concede os benefícios de Berserk, faz com que Destroçar acerte até 3 alvos, e aumenta em 30% o máximo de pontos de vida.

Dura 30 s. Você pode se transformar nesta Forma de Urso aprimorada e voltar ao normal quando quiser por toda a duração.
description_blz.de_DE:
Eine verbesserte Bärengestalt, die die Vorteile von 'Berserker' gewährt, 'Zerfleischen' bis zu 3 Ziele treffen lässt und die maximale Gesundheit um 30% erhöht.

Hält 30 Sek. lang an. Während der Effektdauer könnt Ihr Euch beliebig in diese verbesserte Bärengestalt und zurück verwandeln.
description_blz.en_GB:
An improved Bear Form that grants the benefits of Berserk, causes Mangle to hit up to 3 targets, and increases maximum health by 30%.

Lasts 30 sec. You may freely shapeshift in and out of this improved Bear Form for its duration.
description_blz.es_ES:
Una forma de oso mejorada que otorga los beneficios de Rabia, hace que Destrozar golpee a un máximo de 3 objetivos, y aumenta un 30% la salud máxima.

Dura 30 s. Puedes entrar y salir a voluntad de esta forma de oso mejorada mientras dura.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Une forme d’ours améliorée qui accorde les avantages de Berserk, permet à Mutilation de toucher jusqu’à 3 cibles, et augmente le maximum de points de vie de 30 %.

Dure 30 s. Vous pouvez entrer et sortir librement de cette forme améliorée pendant toute sa durée.
description_blz.it_IT:
Una Forma d'Orso migliorata che fornisce i benefici di Berserk, permette a Dilaniamento di colpire fino a 3 bersagli e aumenta la salute massima del 30%.

Dura 30 s. È possibile mutare forma e tornare in questa quante volte si vuole per tutta la durata dell'effetto.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Улучшенный облик медведя, дающий эффекты "Берсерка", позволяющий "Увечью" поражать до 3 целей и увеличивающий максимальный запас здоровья на 30%.

Время действия – 30 сек. Вы можете принимать или сбрасывать этот облик в течение всего времени действия.
description_blz.ko_KR:
강화된 곰 변신 상태로, 광폭화의 이로운 효과를 부여하고 짓이기기가 최대 3명의 대상을 가격합니다. 또한 최대 생명력이 30%만큼 증가합니다.

30초 동안 지속됩니다. 지속시간 동안 강화된 곰 상태 외의 다른 모습으로 변신하거나 다시 돌아올 수 있습니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
強化的熊形態，賦予狂暴的增益效果，使割碎最多可命中3個目標，並使生命力上限提高30%。

持續30秒。在持續時間內可自由變身或解除這個強化的熊形態。
description_blz.zh_CN:
一种强化的熊形态，能够给予你狂暴效果，使裂伤最多可以击中3个目标，并且最大生命值提高30%。

持续30秒。持续期间内，你可以在其他形态与强化的熊形态之间自由切换。
